CustomField.formula: IF(Commission__c != null, 10, 0) + IF(Product__c != null, 10, 0) + IF(Add_On__c != null, 10, 0) + IF(Company_Code__c != null, 3, 0) + IF(Country__c != null, 2, 0) + IF(City__c != null, 2, 0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Platform__c, ''), 0, 2)+ IF(ISBLANK(Vertical_Segment__c), 0,1)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Arbitrary number that represents the weight of each rule.This is used in determining the priority in cases where multiple rules satisfy the same scenario.
CustomField.label: Weight
